name: Rabbies Racoon (into the night)
description:
You are a angry racoon. Why ,do i hear you ask? Well,a bat battled you at the dumpster and gave you rabbies, and boy do you want revenge! Kill the bats by jumping on them and be carefull ,not to get killed by your enemy.

P.S. I'm scared, this is the first ever thing i share in this catagory,i am no dev,but i am currently following tutorials for g develop ,and this is a small result . Thanks to my friends for the help.
